snippet.title: [Stream] POLYBOT-7 win! (7DRL)
snippet.description:
My first streamed run of this new Cogmind-based 2018 7DRL, and I happened to win! The tactics worked out well enough that I only had to purge once :). There's also a little bit of an introduction to the game, and other development discussion throughout. (For a full postmortem check the dev blog: http://www.gridsagegames.com/blog/2018/03/7drl-postmortem-part-1-preparation/)

Download POLYBOT-7 free here: https://kyzrati.itch.io/polybot-7

Originally streamed via Twitch (180327): http://www.twitch.tv/kyzrati/
